description_html: Bench-crafted in our North Carolina atelier with a sustainably harvested hardwood frame and 8-way hand-tied seat construction, the Greyson Sofa is an instant Verellen best seller. It comes standard with a soy based spring/ down wrap seat construction, loose box style seat cushion, boxed back pillows, and pinched stitch details. Available upholstered only, select from 9 leg finishes. Available as a sleeper and a sectional.
